reviews.content: Looks great, but “just effects” has an offset on my 8+ (maybe it looks better on an X)

Worke perfectly on IPhone X on 13.4.1.

No crashing, no battery drain.
'Use weather effect only' performs not well on iPhone7p
Works great on iOS 13.3 iPhone X!
weather not showing on home screen anymore, status bar works though
It’s amazing! I absolutely love it

Working just fine .
Note: don’t attempt (ldrestart) whiles the tweak active/enabled, you’ll get stack with respiring loop. ( I tested myself)
Folders change color to background. Just a bug though. Works great otherwise
Broken on iPhone X (14.3 RC1, Unc0ver) as of 3-1-2021
My springboard is broken when installed the new version!
